ProcessInstanceHistory.name: ProcessInstanceHistory
ProcessInstanceHistory.description: This read-only object shows all steps and pending approval requests associated with an approval process (ProcessInstance).

ActorId.description: ID of the user who is assigned to this ProcessInstance.

Comments.description: Comments for a ProcessInstanceStep . This field doesn't apply to ProcessInstanceWorkitem records.

ElapsedTimeInDays.description: The total time in days between when the approval process instance was started and when it was completed.

ElapsedTimeInHours.description: The total time in hours between when the approval process instance was started and when it was completed.

ElapsedTimeInMinutes.description: The total time in minutes between when the approval process instance was started and when it was completed.

IsPending.description: Indicates whether the ProcessInstance is pending (true) or not (false).

OriginalActorId.description: ID of the user who was originally assigned this ProcessInstance.

RemindersSent.description: Number of reminders that have been sent. Default is 0 (zero).

StepStatus.description: Indicates the status of the ProcessInstanceStep.

TargetObjectId.description: ID of the object being approved.
